title: [安全丨监控]SeePlayerInventory —— 玩家可以互相查背包了[1.7.X-1.9]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:38 编辑 






一.基础信息(插件的信息与介绍)
目前此插件支持 1.5.2 1.6.2 1.7.2 1.9

插件原帖:seeplayerinventory

seeplayerinventory
打开一个玩家的背包添加/删除一个玩家的物品修改玩家的末影箱使用一种简单的方法来寻找非法物品让玩家请求看到其他玩家的背包二.使用教程(插件的使用及配置)正在编辑中······三.指令和权限(必须要看) 指令(Commands) 权限(Permission) 介绍(Description) /spi ? seeplayerinventory.use.help 显示插件的帮助 /spi open inv <player> seeplayerinventory.use.open.inv 打开某玩家的背包[可编辑] /spi open ec <player> seeplayerinventory.use.open.enderchest 打开某玩家的末影箱[可编辑] /spi see inv <player> seeseeplayerinventory.use.see.inv 查看某玩家的背包[不可编辑] /spi see ec <player> seeplayerinventory.use.see.enderchest 查看某玩家的末影箱[不可编辑] /spi see chest seeplayerinventory.use.see.chest 查看准心面对的箱子[不可编辑] /spi see request <player> seeplayerinventory.use.see.request 向某玩家发出查看背包请求 /spi see request <accept/decline> <player> seeplayerinventory.use.see.request 接受/拒绝某玩家发送的请求 /spi target seeplayerinventory.use.target target指令帮助 /spi target inv seeplayerinventory.use.target.inv 获取一根[道具]棒子(右键打开玩家背包,可编辑) /spi target ec seeplayerinventory.use.target.enderchest 获取一根[道具]棒子(右键打开玩家末影箱,可编辑) /spi menu seeplayerinventory.use.menu 打开玩家菜单 /spi reload seeplayerinventory.use.reload 重载插件  seeplayerinventory.admin 所有指令权限  seeplayerinventory.use.open 打开指令权限  seeplayerinventory.use.see 查看指令权限  seeplayerinventory.checkupdates 自动更新权限

四.插件更新日志Version 1.6英文+ Added inventory see requests.+ Compatibility with CraftBukkit 1.9.+ Add Commands:╠ /spi see request <player>╠ /spi see request accept <player>╠ /spi see request decline<player>! Changed the way to edit a inventory works, now you can edit the armor and the off hand slot, you can even drop items in front of the player.! Changed the menu skulls so that now the player skin appers instance of the steve skull* Fixed the error with the View ender chest menu.* Fixed an error where when a user was viewing another user enderchest/inv he could put items in.

中文+ 添加请求查看某玩家的物品.+ 兼容CraftBukkit 1.9.+ 添加指令:╠ /spi see request <player>╠ /spi see request accept <player>╠ /spi see request decline<player>! 修改编辑模式,允许编辑玩家的装备栏和手槽(背包的最底下9个格子).! 修改菜单里的玩家头颅,使玩家的头颅更像史蒂夫的.* 玩家查看他人背包,可能有点误差.* 当一个玩家查看另一个玩家的背包/末影箱时,可以给他物品.
Version 1.5英文+ Target mode.+ Add Inventory View Mode and Chet View Mode.+ Add Inventory View Mode in the inv menu.+ Compatibility with CraftBukkit 1.7.2 R0.2.+ Add Commands:╠ /spi target╠ /spi target <inv/ec>╠ /spi see <inv/ec> <Player>╠ /spi see chest! Changed the command "/spi open <player>" and "/spi ec <player>" to "/spi open <inv/ec> <player>".* Fix some little errors.

中文+ 添加Targe模式.+ 添加查看背包的Gui和箱子的Gui.+ 添加在背包中添加物品的菜单.+ 兼容CraftBukkit 1.7.2 R0.2.+ 添加指令:╠ /spi target╠ /spi target <inv/ec>╠ /spi see <inv/ec> <Player>╠ /spi see chest! 修改指令"/spi open <player>"和 "/spi ec <player>" 为 "/spi open <inv/ec> <player>".*修复一些错误.

五.下载插件怎么装插件？装插件五部曲1.首先关闭服务器2.然后下载此插件3.插件丢进plugin里4.然后开启服务器5.开始享受插件吧

下载地址(有汉化)此插件正在汉化中，请耐心等待下载地址: http://pan.baidu.com/s/1o89vO2A

replies.author: 青木源
replies.txt_content:
准备上的衣服和盾也可以拿啦？
太好啦！

replies.author: QQ1357288463
replies.txt_content: 坑爹，应该弄成只能看装备和手里面拿着的

replies.author: qaz5201457
replies.txt_content: 挺好的一个插件 自带的看不了 武器装备那一栏蛋疼
普通玩家可以查op背包吗？
